title: Rick Perry to Step Down as Energy Secretary
text:
Energy Secretary Rick Perry announced his resignation Thursday amid growing scrutiny of his role in the president’s interactions with Ukraine, including a subpoena from the House impeachment inquiry.

The departure will come later this year, Mr. Perry said in a video announcement posted to his Twitter account. He said he wants to return to Texas, “my favorite place in the world” and didn’t mention the impeachment inquiry. A person familiar with the matter said he would leave near the end of the year as part of an exit planned...
